org.factcenter.qilin.comm

Interface SendableOutput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.DataOutput
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Channel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalChannelFactory.LocalChannel, SendableByteArrayOutputStream, SendableOutputStream, TCPChannelFactory.TCPChannel

    public interface SendableOutput
extends java.io.DataOutput
    Extend DataOutput with ability to write certain types of objects: primitive arrays, Collections, BigIntegers and Sendables. Writing other objects will cause a runtime exception.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Write an object that can be null.
